title: Luxury brand new house at Etulkotte
details:
Architecturally designed modern brand new luxury house for sale at Etulkotte
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Five bedrooms with attached bathrooms
Office room
TV lobby
Modern fitted pantry
Servant room, Driver's room, maids' toilets
Swimming pool
Large landscaped garden
High parapet walls with roller shutter gate and two wicket gates
Solar net metering system
CCTV cameras and security alarm system
Brick walls, high quality materials, uncommon wooden ceiling
Double covered parking,
High residential area
Facing to 20 ft wide road way
